summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 22G Roofing website - all major functionality working correctly including backend APIs, frontend navigation, quote form submission, and mobile responsiveness
passed_tests: All 6 backend API endpoints (root, contact-info, services, projects, quote submission, get quotes)
Homepage loads with video hero background and proper overlay
Navigation works between all pages (Home, About, Services, Projects, Contact)
Logo visible and links to homepage correctly
Quote form submits successfully and stores in database with success message
Services page displays all 5 services with images and proper structure
Projects gallery loads with 6 project cards and lightbox functionality
Contact page shows both contacts (Pavandeep & Bhupendra) with correct phone numbers
Google Maps embed visible and functional on Contact page
Mobile responsive design - hamburger menu works correctly
Footer displays company info and both phone numbers
Quote form validation and database integration working
Project filtering and lightbox modal functionality
Mobile navigation menu with all links functional
